肶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pí］
［《廣韻》房脂切，平脂，並。］
(1)牛羊等反刍类动物的重瓣胃，即俗所谓“百叶”。
(2)比喻胸臆。
(3)厚赐。

肶字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　肶； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页976第20
【廣韻】房脂切【集韻】頻脂切，?音毗。本作膍。【說文】牛百葉也。一曰鳥膍胵。【儀禮·旣夕東方之饌四豆脾析註】脾，讀爲雞脾肶之脾。牛百葉也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】肶，厚也。【註】肶輔皆厚重。　又【集韻】駢迷切，音鼙。義同。　又必至切，音畀。祠也。【五音集韻】以豚祠司命也。　又【五音集韻】傍禮切，音陛。髀股也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pí］
["Guangyun" Fangzhi cut, flat fat, and. ]
(1) The double stomach of ruminants such as cattle and sheep, which is commonly called "louver".
(2) A metaphorical figure.
(3) Thick gift.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　肶; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 976 20
[Guangyun] Fangzhi cut [Jiyun] Frequency fat cut, sound conjunct. This is a mutton. [Said the text] Niu Baiye also. One said the bird's mutton. [Ritual·Eastern Delicacy of the East Four Bean Spleen Annotation] The spleen is read as the spleen of the chicken spleen. Cow blinds also.　[Erya·Shiu] again, thick. [Note] Both of them are heavy and heavy.　[Jiyun] Pian, fan cut, sound. The same meaning.　It must be cut again, sound 畀. Temple also. 【Pentagram Rhyme】It is also the life of the dolphin.　[Five-tone Jiyun] Practically cut, sound sire. Tie shares also.
